resources.string: The address must be at least %1$d characters long
The address should only be up to %1$d characters
The name of team must have at least %1$d characters
The name of team should only have up to %1$d characters
The member name must be at least %1$d characters long
The member name must be at most %1$d characters long
The description should only be up to %1$d characters
The pitch name must be at least %1$d characters long
The pitch name should only have up to %1$d characters
The minimum %1$s date must be earlier than the maximum %1$s date
The maximum %1$s date must be later than the minimum %1$s date
The player\'s age must be greater than %1$d
The player\'s age must be less than %1$d
Minimum age must be less than maximum age
Maximum age must be greater than minimum age
